      • getHeterogeneousVehiclesIds

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getHeterogeneousVehiclesIds()
                                                                  throws com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException
        Gets a list of vehicle ids from the chosen Layer's Field. Returns an empty list (and shows user errors) in case of empty or repeated values.
        Throws:
        com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException

      • getHeterogeneousVehiclesCapacities

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> getHeterogeneousVehiclesCapacities()
                                                                        throws com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException
        Gets the capacity values of all the vehicles. It verifies if the chosen Capacity field is a suitable one. It's suitable if there are no empty (or non-numeric) values.
        Throws:
        com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException

      • isHomogeneousFleet

        public boolean isHomogeneousFleet()
        Is the chosen vehicle fleet Homogeneous? By homogeneous we mean that all the vehicles have the same capacity.
        Returns:
        True if the user chose an Homogeneous fleet. False otherwise.
